product_name: Outdoor Research San Juan Beanie - Women's
long_description: Featuring a stylish button tab at the cuff and a unique tie in place of a traditional pom, the Outdoor Research San Juan beanie brings a fresh look to winter warmth. Soft merino wool/acrylic knit offers excellent warmth; it also breathes well when you're active, wicks moisture and dries faster than wool alone when damp.
short_description: Featuring a stylish button tab at the cuff and a unique tie in place of a traditional pom, the Outdoor Research San Juan beanie brings a fresh look to winter warmth.
